email_chain.subject: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Houston, Soybean Meal 8500MT - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We are exploring options for shipping 8500MT of soybean meal from Santos to Houston under CFR terms. We've been advised that your vessel, the MV OCEAN BREEZE, might be available. Could you confirm her current position and expected availability? Also, can you provide the initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Houston, Soybean Meal 8500MT - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thanks for reaching out. Yes, the MV OCEAN BREEZE is currently open in Santos and could be positioned for your laycan, ideally starting from October 10. The initial freight quote for the shipment would be USD 45.50 per metric tonne. Kindly note that this rate includes fuel but not any potential demurrage charges, should they arise.

Let me know your thoughts or if you need further details!
Cheers,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Houston, Soybean Meal 8500MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

Thank you for the immediate response and details. The rate of USD 45.50 seems a bit high considering current market fluctuations. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates applicable and the expected loading window in Santos?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best, Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Houston, Soybean Meal 8500MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Understood. I can adjust the rate to USD 43.00 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window in Santos is expected to be from October 10 to October 15.

Let me know if this works for you.
Cheers,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Houston, Soybean Meal 8500MT - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

USD 43.00 per metric tonne is acceptable. Please confirm the details and let's proceed with the shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: CFR Santos to Houston, Soybean Meal 8500MT - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Excellent! Recap attached. Thanks for the business!

Commodity: Soybean Meal
Quantity: 8500 MT
Load Port: Santos
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 43.00/MT
Laycan: 10-15 Oct 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
